full_threads.body:
Hi Heath

Please see attached word doc for the bespoke section of the platform

Many thanks

Danielle Allport
Business Development Manager
Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:
<https://www.facebook.com/AdvantageStyling/> <https://www.instagram.com/advantagestyling/>

P 02 9310 1611 | M 0404 855 287

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019
PO Box 7125, ALEXANDRIA NSW 2015

www.advantagestyling.com.au <http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/>

From: Danielle Allport
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 2021 9:36 AM
To: Dan Gerber <dan@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:dan@advantagestyling.com.au>>
Cc: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au <mailto:heath@wolfiq.com.au>>; Zohrab Keledjian <zohrab@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:zohrab@advantagestyling.com.au>>; David McLean <Davidm@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:Davidm@advantagestyling.com.au>>
Subject: Re: Trades Platform changes

Okay, will do :)

Danielle Allport
Business Development Manager

Advantage Property Styling
M: 0404 855 287
P: +612 9310 1611


> On 17 Aug 2021, at 9:00 am, Dan Gerber <dan@advantagestyling.com.au <mailto:dan@advantagestyling.com.au>> wrote:
>
> ﻿
> Hi Danielle - Would you mind sending Heath a mockup in Word please of the proposed amendment to the design of the BESPOKE TRADES section? I would like to stop the iteration of this platform so we can launch, so we need to be 100% prescriptive in all our directions from now on. If in doubt on the design please send to me first.
>
> Hi Heath – in addition to Danielle’s email, can we please also make the font exactly the same as the prior platform. For some reason the whole thing has reverted to a different font.
>
> I look through to a team walk through. I think it will only take 15-20 mins.
>
> Cheers
> Dan
>
> Dan Gerber
> Managing Director
> Advantage Property Styling
>

> Subject: Trades Platform changes
>
> Hi Heath
>
> Hope you're well! Thanks for all your hard work on the platform its looking great. Few minor notes, could you please action the attached PDF changes to the quote platform when you have a chance
>
> Separately, if we could arrange a final platform walk through call together once those amendments have been made. If we could please do this call this week sometime if possible? Attendees will be Myself, Dan and Zohrab
>
> Danielle Allport
> Business Development Manager
> Advantage Property Styling
